overview.title: Industry Solutions
overview.description: Tailored power transmission solutions designed for specific industry requirements, ensuring optimal performance and reliability in every application.

solutions.title: New Energy Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Advanced power transmission for solar, wind, and energy storage systems
solutions.description: Yanghua STI provides specialized flexible busbar solutions for the new energy sector, addressing the unique power transmission challenges in solar, wind, and energy storage applications. Our solutions ensure reliable, efficient power delivery even in demanding environments.
highlights: High current capacity for large-scale installations
Superior heat dissipation for continuous operation

advantages.title: Enhanced Reliability
advantages.description: Our flexible busbar systems are engineered for continuous operation in harsh environments, providing superior reliability compared to traditional solutions.

advantages.title: Cost-Effective Installation
advantages.description: With reduced installation time and fewer components, our solutions significantly lower overall project costs.

advantages.title: Superior Performance
advantages.description: High current-carrying capacity with minimal voltage drop ensures optimal system performance.

caseStudies.title: Large-Scale Solar Farm
caseStudies.description: Implemented our flexible busbar solution across 500MW solar installation, reducing installation time by 40%.

caseStudies.title: Offshore Wind Platform
caseStudies.description: Provided corrosion-resistant busbar system for critical power distribution in harsh marine environment.

solutions.title: Power System Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Reliable grid infrastructure and power distribution solutions
solutions.description: Our flexible busbar solutions enhance the reliability and efficiency of power transmission and distribution systems. Designed for substations, switchgear, and grid modernization projects, they offer superior performance compared to traditional conductors.

advantages.title: Grid Stability
advantages.description: Our solutions contribute to enhanced grid stability with consistent electrical characteristics and reduced losses.

advantages.title: Quick Installation
advantages.description: Pre-fabricated sections and simplified connections reduce installation time and complexity.

advantages.title: Long-term Reliability
advantages.description: Engineered for decades of reliable service with minimal maintenance requirements.

caseStudies.title: Urban Substation Upgrade
caseStudies.description: Modernized aging substation with our flexible busbar system, improving efficiency and reliability.

solutions.title: Industrial Building Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Efficient power distribution for manufacturing and industrial facilities
solutions.description: Optimize power distribution in your industrial facilities with our flexible busbar solutions. Designed for manufacturing plants, warehouses, and processing facilities, they provide safe, reliable power with easy installation and maintenance.

advantages.title: Space Efficiency
advantages.description: Compact design allows installation in tight spaces where traditional solutions won't fit.

advantages.title: Installation Flexibility
advantages.description: Easily route around structural obstacles without custom fabrication.

advantages.title: Reduced Downtime
advantages.description: Quick installation and easy modifications minimize facility downtime during upgrades.

caseStudies.title: Automotive Manufacturing Plant
caseStudies.description: Retrofitted assembly line power distribution with our flexible busbar, reducing installation time by 50%.

solutions.title: Data Center Solutions
solutions.subtitle: High-density power solutions for critical IT infrastructure
solutions.description: Ensure uninterrupted power delivery to your critical IT infrastructure with our specialized data center solutions. Designed for high-density server farms, cloud facilities, and colocation centers, they provide reliable power with enhanced safety features.

advantages.title: Mission-Critical Reliability
advantages.description: Engineered for 99.99% uptime with redundant power paths and fail-safe mechanisms.

advantages.title: Cooling Efficiency
advantages.description: Reduced heat generation and improved airflow design minimize cooling costs.

advantages.title: Scalability
advantages.description: Easily expandable design accommodates growing power demands without major infrastructure changes.

caseStudies.title: Hyperscale Data Center
caseStudies.description: Deployed our busbar solution across 50MW facility, achieving 15% improvement in power efficiency.

solutions.title: Rail Transit Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Safe and reliable power for railway and metro systems
solutions.description: Our flexible busbar solutions provide safe, reliable power distribution for railway and metro systems. Engineered for metro systems, railway stations, and signaling systems, they offer enhanced safety and performance in transit environments.

advantages.title: Passenger Safety
advantages.description: Non-inductive sheath and fire-resistant materials ensure maximum safety for passengers and personnel.

advantages.title: Vibration Resistance
advantages.description: Specialized construction withstands continuous vibrations from train operations.

advantages.title: Minimal Maintenance
advantages.description: Sealed design and high-quality materials reduce maintenance requirements in hard-to-access locations.

caseStudies.title: Urban Metro Expansion
caseStudies.description: Supplied busbar system for new metro line, meeting strict safety and performance requirements.

solutions.title: Metallurgy & Chemical Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Heavy-duty power solutions for harsh industrial environments
solutions.description: Deliver reliable power in the harshest industrial environments with our metallurgy and chemical solutions. Designed for steel mills, chemical plants, and refineries, they provide exceptional durability and performance in extreme conditions.

advantages.title: Extreme Environment Performance
advantages.description: Specialized materials and construction methods ensure reliable operation in the harshest conditions.

advantages.title: Long Service Life
advantages.description: Engineered for extended service life even in corrosive and high-temperature environments.

advantages.title: Reduced Maintenance
advantages.description: High-quality materials and robust construction minimize maintenance requirements and downtime.

caseStudies.title: Integrated Steel Plant
caseStudies.description: Installed corrosion-resistant busbar system throughout facility, extending maintenance intervals by 3x.

solutions.title: Marine & Shipping Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Corrosion-resistant power solutions for marine applications
solutions.description: Our marine and shipping solutions provide reliable, corrosion-resistant power distribution for maritime applications. Designed for ports, ships, and offshore platforms, they ensure safe, efficient power delivery in challenging marine environments.
highlights: Robust construction for harsh marine conditions

advantages.title: Marine-Grade Durability
advantages.description: Specialized materials and coatings provide exceptional resistance to saltwater corrosion and marine conditions.

advantages.title: Safety Compliance
advantages.description: Meets international marine safety standards for passenger and cargo vessels.

advantages.title: Vessel Optimization
advantages.description: Lightweight, flexible design reduces vessel weight and accommodates ship movements.

caseStudies.title: Offshore Oil Platform
caseStudies.description: Provided explosion-proof busbar system for critical power distribution in hazardous offshore environment.
